DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : COMPANY TOWN ANNEX
DOC.TEXT: Reuters , Telemundo Launching Latin_American News Channel : Reuters , Telemundo and three other media companies plan to launch a new , 24-hour Spanish-language news channel in Latin_America this spring . The partners become the latest companies to enter the fast-growing Latin_American market . The new service , named TeleNoticias , will be based at Telemundo ' s Hialeah , Fla. , headquarters .
